EmailTemplate.name: 201911_Americas_Event_Helicopter-Happy-Hour_amr.Email 2 A/B.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: You're invited to the Honeywell Helicopter Social on January 27th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
KICK OFF 2020 WITH A HELICOPTER SOCIAL HOUR Honeywell's Helicopter Social Hour Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Are you attending the HAI Heli-Expo?
I would like to invite you to a Honeywell Helicopter Social on January 27th, the night before HAI. This social hour will draw the top owners, operators, directors of maintenance, technicians, consultants and manufacturers in the Helicopter Industry. Highly regarded experts from Honeywell will lead 4-5 discussion tables that cover a range of current topics in Helicopter Avionics, Communication SATCOM, Propulsion Engines and much more.
This is a great opportunity to connect with peers, make new contacts, learn something new and enjoy the sights and tastes of Anaheim, California. Register today! DATE January 27, 2020 TIME 2:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. PST LOCATION Anaheim Brewery <[[https://g.page/anaheimbrew?share]]>
336 S Anaheim Blvd
Anaheim, CA 92805 Products and Topics Supported at the Event:
- Helicopter Avionics (Epic, EGPWS, HUMS) - Communication – Satcom (Aspire 200, skyconnect) - Propulsion Engines (HTS900, LTS101, T53, T55) - Our Aerospace Portal
Honeywell representatives from our businesses, customer and product support, field services and technical sales will all be on hand—we look forward to seeing you!
